name: Cohabitation
description:
You and your friend face hordes of enemies. Both of you have 3 lives only — will you manage to save each other?

This game is part of Eva Enta's Gaming Alphabet — a collection of short, themed, gameplay-narrative games (for now — just prototypes). Here is the full list:

  • Apathy
  • Bribe
  • Cohabitation
  • [in development]
